There is a place for photography in this world. The function of photography and art itself is constantly changing and as an artist, it is just part of the struggle to constantly question yourself and the motives behind the work that we produce. Branding is crucial to how we are recognized as individuals. Think of branding in terms of consistency and the use of one’s perceptual eye. Art is a reflection of oneself.
